title: 3.2 Master Challenge 1
question:
a. Create a web page named Causes of climate change.
b. The title of the web page should be Causes and effects.
c. Write about any four causes of climate change and their effects using any four different heading levels.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
